deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
Creates a Market contract based on the market name and type.  The market contract will generate and assign
 a unique id to the market.
Returns the number of markets created.

Creates a Market contract based on the market name and type.  The market contract will generate and assign
 a unique id to the market.
Returns the number of markets created.

createMarket(string,uint8).notice: Creates a Market contract based on the market name and type.  The market contract will generate and assign a unique id to the market.

getNumMarkets().notice: Returns the number of markets created.
